title: Hotels expand presence in tier-II cities amid booming leisure travel
description: The share of hotel rooms in the tier-II and tier-III cities increased to 38% of the total inventory at the end of 2022 from 33% four years ago according to a recent HVS-Anarock report. The share of hotel rooms in metros reduced to 19% from 30% during the period.
